Description:
Pawn - Moves normally
Knight - If at a Row location, move directly to Distant Square.  If at Distant Square, move directly to a Row location with an investigator.
Bishop - Move directly to investigator at even row if at even row, or odd row if at odd row.
Rook - Move one location at a time until it reaches an investigator, does not attack if moved more than once.
Queen - Move as Bishop, if can't then as Rook
Name: Notecard
